No. 77770)) Sub: Policy Guidelines for release of Advertisements, Notifications, Notices and other Media Related Activities reg: In partial modification to NHAI Policy circular No. 4.25/2019 dated 01.10.2019, the following amendments are made: (a) Para 7.0 (ii) of the Delegation of powers for Media Relations Works shall be read as: To whom Extent of Sl. No_ Subject delegated delegation_ (ii) (i)  Designing of CGM (in-charge Full powers on DAVP advertisements/ creative of Media)/ rates (ii) Production of audio/ video Regional Officers (b) Para 2.1 relating to Land Acquisition Notification shall be read as: 2.1 Land Acquisition (LA) Notifications: For   publishing of LA Notifications in the newspapers, following guidelines shall be followed: (a) Land Acquisition Notifications shall be released by the concerned Regional Office through an advertising agency or to the newspapers directly on DAVP rates, as per the laid down guidelines: In case of releasing the notification through an advertising agency, it shall be released through the agencies empanelled with respective RO only, as per the roster. (b) In order to maintain uniformity, the notifications shall be released as per the template issued by Ministry of RTGH vide letter No. NH-11011/71/2022-LA dated 23.10.2023 placed at Annexure 'A or /and as amended from time to time- ROs shall ensure that the template is followed for all LA notifications. The following note shall also be added at the bottom of the notification "Note: The physical copy of this notification is also available at the office of CALA/ PIU/ RO and land owners may also see the notification there. (c) Font of the text shall be Arial/Arial Narrow in 7 point in English and Narad 8 point in Hindi for running text  Spacing and other specifications shall be as per Annexure B' Contd_2I - A1 7 7 9 NHAI
